column1: Uchi////My favorites include the Hama Chill (yellow tail with ponzu and thai chili's and oranges)
column6: Brussel sprouts (crispy w/lemon chili). I also like the hot rock wagyu beef [not really unique here
column10: and sweet potato crisp.. different). The sushi selection is really good and fresh
column11: with reasonable cuts of fish. For dessert
column12: I recommend (Im sure everyone else does as well) the Fried Milk
column13: and also the Lime Ash Sorbet.
